thread.title: Paul Ryan to run for speaker if House Republicans will rally behind him
thread.title_full: Paul Ryan to run for speaker if House Republicans will rally behind him - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Paul Ryan to run for speaker if House Republicans will rally behind him
text: Congressman Paul Ryan said Monday he's ready to replace Speaker John A. Boehner if House Republicans are willing to rally behind his vision, capping after a lengthy wait to hear from the man who many had tapped as the only savior for the bitterly divided caucus. Mr. Ryan, Wisconsin Republican, ... ...
